pages.page:
What is SPC flooring?
SPC flooring is considered the “next generation” in vinyl flooring.
In addition, unlike wood and laminate floors, they are 100% water
resistant, being much more versatile and suitable for all types of spaces, including wet rooms in the house such as bathrooms
and kitchens.
This name, an acronym for Solid Polimer Composite, refers to
its composition, which is more rigid than that of traditional vinyl
because its core is made of limestone and stabilizers.
2

Advantages of SPC
vinyl floors
• They are water resistant.
• They reduce the risk of expansion
and/or contraction associated with
temperature changes.
• They are versatile.
• They offer high resistance to shocks
and impacts.
• They have great insulation/
soundproofing capabilities.
• Easy to install.
• Easy to clean.
• Guaranteed quality and warranty.
3
